Name: Space Nations - Battlearena
About the game: A Space Nations Battlearena is a video-game that blends the survival, space simulator, and scavenging elements with last-man-standing gameplay, which challenges large number of players. Starting with minimal equipment eliminate your opponents, while avoiding being trapped outside of a shrinking 'safe area', and bear away.
